name: Shadow Pong
description:
!!!! POTENTIAL EPILEPSY WARNING !!!! 

This game contains flashing lights.

Pong but I cheaped out on the lighting, making it *slightly* more challenging :)

This is the first game I've ever made, so I figured I'd start with a classic! I put my own twist on it by having the lights turn off after half a minute, upping the game difficulty slightly.

Controls:
Player 1: W/A
Player 2: UpArrow/DownArrow
